text: everything in between. That person is the breadwinner . Maybe it is you. You do it all. You show up, provide, solve problems, and keep things going. But there is a question that often sits quietly in the back of your mind: “What will happen to my family if I am no longer here?” It is a terrifying thought, and one most breadwinners try to push aside. But if you truly love the people who depend on you, it is a question worth answering today , not tomorrow. The Truth About Being a Breadwinner in Nigeria Being a breadwinner in Nigeria is not just about income, it is about responsibility. It is carrying the weight of everyone’s needs and dreams. You might be: A first-born child funding your younger siblings’ education A parent raising a family with a single income A small business owner providing for extended relatives A spouse with a partner and kids who look to you for financial security Every month, you calculate and stretch. You plan. You pray. You work hard not just for yourself, but for everyone around you. But the reality is, life is unpredictable . Accidents happen. Illness can strike. The unthinkable is

text: with a partner and kids who look to you for financial security Every month, you calculate and stretch. You plan. You pray. You work hard not just for yourself, but for everyone around you. But the reality is, life is unpredictable . Accidents happen. Illness can strike. The unthinkable is possible, and when the person everyone depends on is suddenly not there, the result can be devastating. A Safety Net Every Breadwinner Needs That is where Term Life Insurance comes in. It is one of the most important financial tools a breadwinner can have, and unfortunately, one of the most misunderstood. With Term Life Insurance from Heirs Insurance Group, you can guarantee that your family will receive a lump sum (also known as income replacement) if anything happens to you. That means: School fees can still be paid Rent and bills will not become a crisis Your loved ones can grieve without financial fear And the best part? It is affordable. With as little as 1% of the amount you want your family to receive, you can start a plan today. Why It Matters Now No one likes to think about death. But true love plans ahead. If you have

text: grieve without financial fear And the best part? It is affordable. With as little as 1% of the amount you want your family to receive, you can start a plan today. Why It Matters Now No one likes to think about death. But true love plans ahead. If you have ever lost sleep wondering what will happen to your people if something happens to you, then this is the sign you need. Insurance is not just for the wealthy. It is for anyone who loves deeply and plans wisely. If you are the go-to person in your family, then you are already doing something heroic. Do not let all your hard work end with you. With Term Life Insurance, you can leave a legacy that keeps your loved ones safe and secure, even when you are no longer around. Start your Term Life Plan today with Heirs Insurance Group.
